description: Sakurako is a http://anidb.net/t6987 [bathroom haunter] who haunts http://anidb.net/ch40946 [Takahashi]`s school`s boys` toilet. She uses a wig and costume to hide her short, bob-cut, black hair and childish appearance. Violent, depraved, prone to rape and murder, will she find true love with Takahashi?
name: Toire no Hanako-san no Sakurako-san
